Now that you've found a complex spell, you can replicate this feat!
Choose a spell with multiple actions and pay attention to 2 things:
$(li)Whether there are any additional words separating these groups$()
Thankfully, some assumptions always hold true for complex spells like these.
The Descriptors affecting an action will always be adjacent to the action, for instance,
and within each section the Action and Descriptors will be in the same order.
Additionally, actions will always resolve left to right,
so if you put an action further left in the spell it will be executed first.
